channel.title: Comments on: Shirt
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: monica
item.dc:creator: monica
item.description: Glad to hear you didn't "lose your shirt" literally:)I hear you about December. It's that "getting ready to reboot" thing maybe? I think maybe we should study plate techtonics, see how thse shifts are working...
item.content:encoded: Glad to hear you didn’t “lose your shirt” literally:)I hear you about December. It’s that “getting ready to reboot” thing maybe? I think maybe we should study plate techtonics, see how thse shifts are working…
